qas.question: What does Link assist Midna in collection?
Who attacks Link and Midna when they've finished their collection tasks?
What weapon can transform Link back to his original self?
Where do the Zoras come from?
What does Link help Midna find?
What does Link discover he needs to find to return to human form?
Who sacrifices herself to save Midna?
What does Link assist Gorons in collecting?
Who attacks Gorons and Eldin when they've finished their collection?
What weapon can transform Zelda back to his original self?
Where do the Eldin come from?

context: During this time, Link also helps Midna find the <a0_0><a5_0>Fused Shadows<a5_0/><a0_0/>, fragments of a relic containing powerful dark magic. In return, she helps Link find Ordon Village's children while helping the monkeys of Faron, the Gorons of Eldin, and the Zoras of <a4_0><b13_0>Lanayru<b13_0/><a4_0/>. Once Link has restored the Light Spirits and Midna has all the <b9_0>Fused Shadows<b9_0/>, they are ambushed by <a1_0><a6_0><b10_0>Zant<b10_0/><a6_0/><a1_0/>. After he relieves Midna of the Fused Shadow fragments, she ridicules him for abusing his tribe's magic, but Zant reveals that his power comes from another source as he uses it to turn Link back into a wolf, and then leaves Midna in Hyrule to die from the world's light. Bringing a dying Midna to <a3_0><a8_0>Zelda<a8_0/><a3_0/>, Link learns he needs the <a2_0><a7_0><b11_0>Master Sword<b11_0/><a7_0/><a2_0/> to return to human form. <b12_0>Zelda<b12_0/> sacrifices herself to heal Midna with her power before vanishing mysteriously. Midna is moved by Zelda's sacrifice, and begins to care more about Link and the fate of the light world.
